item.title: Disney sends cease-and-desist to ByteDance over AI-generated videos
item.description: Disney has sent a cease-and-desist letter to ByteDance accusing the Chinese company of using Disney characters to train and power its Seedance 2.0 AI video generator without permission, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.

item.title: 日本首相高市早苗将与日本央行行长植田和男举行胜选后首次会晤
item.description: 日本央行行长植田和男与首相高市早苗将于周一举行执政党大选压倒性胜利后的首次双边会晤，此次会晤或将成为讨论央行加息计划的场合。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda and Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi will hold their first bilateral meeting on Monday since the ruling party's landslide election victory, which could serve as a venue to discuss the central bank's rate-hike plans.】

item.title: 日元在强势一周后走软，美元持稳，交易员权衡利率前景
item.description: 日元在本周初走势疲软，此前因财政担忧缓解而大幅上涨；美元则保持稳定，因疲软的通胀数据增强了美联储今年晚些时候降息的可能性。【原文：The Japanese yen started the week on the back foot after strong gains last week on easing fiscal worries while the U.S. dollar was steady as soft inflation data boosted the case for interest rate cuts from the Federal Reserve later this year.】

item.title: 油价在美伊核谈判前小幅上涨
item.description: 周一油价横盘整理，市场正等待华盛顿与德黑兰的会谈结果。对伊朗与美国紧张局势可能扰乱石油供应的担忧为油价提供了支撑，而欧佩克+倾向于从4月起恢复增产计划。【原文：Oil prices traded sideways on Monday ahead of talks between Washington and Tehran, with concerns about Iran-U.S. tensions disrupting oil flows keeping a floor under prices, while OPEC+ leans in favour of resuming output hikes from April.】

item.title: 日本执政联盟年轻领导人警告勿干预日本央行政策
item.description: 日本执政联盟的次要伙伴领导人告诉路透社，日本政府必须避免干预货币政策，而应专注于采取措施建设足够强大的经济体，以抵御任何进一步加息可能带来的冲击。【原文：Japan's government must avoid meddling in monetary policy and focus on steps to build an economy strong enough to weather the potential pain from any further interest rate hikes, the leader of the ruling coalition's junior partner told Reuters.】

item.title: 冬日经济成为中国刺激政策转向服务业的典型代表
item.description: 北京北部的罗丽滑雪场是疫情后罕见的成功案例，中国政府希望通过国家主导的投资在各服务业领域复制这一模式，这正成为今年一项重要但风险较高的政策转向。【原文：Luo Li's ski resort north of Beijing is a rare post-pandemic success story that Chinese authorities want to replicate through state-led investments in various services sectors, in what is emerging as an important, albeit risky, policy shift this year.】

item.title: 亚洲股市因假期而平静，日本数据惨淡
item.description: 亚洲股市周一在假期影响下交投清淡，近期大幅涨幅正悄然回调。日本经济数据疲软也令该地区股市的涨势有所降温。【原文：Asian shares were quietly consolidating recent hefty gains on Monday as holidays made for thin trading, and dismal economic data out of Japan took some of the heat out of that booming market.】

item.title: 日本第四季度经济增长乏力，低于预期
item.description: 日本政府周一公布的数据显示，该国经济在去年10月至12月季度实现年化0.2%的微弱增长，企业投资仅勉强扭转此前下滑趋势，经济才勉强重回增长轨道。【原文：Japan's economy eked out an annualised 0.2% expansion in the October-December quarter, government data showed on Monday, scraping back to growth as corporate investment only just reversed its previous decline.】

item.title: 澳大利亚Qube公司同意接受由麦格理集团牵头的财团83亿美元收购要约
item.description: 澳大利亚Qube控股公司周一同意接受由麦格理资产管理公司（MAM）牵头的财团提出的117亿澳元（82.6亿美元）收购要约，该物流集团股价因此创下历史新高。【原文：Australia's Qube Holdings on Monday agreed to an A$11.7 billion ($8.26 billion) buyout offer from a consortium led by Macquarie Asset Management (MAM) , sending shares in the logistics group to a record high.】

item.title: OpenClaw创始人斯坦伯格加入OpenAI，开源聊天机器人成为基金会项目
item.description: OpenAI首席执行官山姆·阿尔特曼周日宣布，开源机器人OpenClaw的创始人彼得·斯坦伯格将加入OpenAI，该开源机器人项目将转型为基金会。【原文：Peter Steinberger, the founder of OpenClaw, is joining OpenAI, and the open-source bot is becoming a foundation, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said on Sunday.】

item.title: 英国工党领袖斯塔默寻求更大权力以监管网络访问
item.description: 英国首相基尔·斯塔默将寻求更广泛的权力来监管互联网接入。他周日表示，此举旨在保护儿童免受快速变化的数字风险侵害。【原文：British Prime Minister Keir Starmer will seek broader powers to regulate internet access, which he said on Sunday was needed to protect children from fast-changing digital risks.】

item.title: 澳大利亚收购目标蓝星钢铁上半年业绩超预期
item.description: 澳大利亚收购目标蓝星集团周一公布，其上半年盈利激增逾两倍，超出市场预期。这得益于美国利差扩大、主要市场销量增长以及稳健的成本控制表现。【原文：Australian takeover target BlueScope on Monday reported a more than two-fold jump in its first-half earnings and beat estimates due to stronger U.S. spreads, higher volumes across key markets, and solid cost performance.】

item.title: Treasury Wine上半年利润减半，中期股息暂停派发
item.description: 澳大利亚Treasury Wine Estates公司周一公布的上半年基本利润几乎减半，并作为优先保障资本的措施，暂时暂停支付2026财年中期股息。【原文：Australia's Treasury Wine Estates' first-half underlying profit nearly halved on Monday, and it temporarily suspended the payment of its fiscal 2026 interim dividend as a measure to prioritise preservation of capital.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，华纳兄弟正考虑重启与派拉蒙的收购谈判。
item.description: 据彭博社周日援引知情人士报道，华纳兄弟探索公司正考虑与竞争对手派拉蒙天空舞影业重启收购谈判，此前该公司收到了这家敌意收购方的最新修订报价。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery is considering reopening sale talks with rival Hollywood studio Paramount Skydance after receiving its hostile suitor's most recent amended offer, Bloomberg News reported on Sunday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 新西兰a2牛奶中期盈利增长9.4%
item.description: 新西兰a2牛奶公司周一公布，其上半年利润增长9.4%，主要得益于其婴儿配方奶粉产品在关键市场中国表现强劲。【原文：New Zealand's a2 Milk reported a 9.4% rise in half-year profit on Monday, supported by robust performance of its infant milk formula product segment in its key China market.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克总理称，基辅方面对"友谊"输油管道实施政治勒索
item.description: 斯洛伐克总理罗伯特·菲科周日表示，尽管近期受损的"友谊"输油管道（将俄罗斯石油经乌克兰输往匈牙利和斯洛伐克）可能已修复，但乌克兰可能正通过延迟恢复供油来施压匈牙利，迫使其放弃反对乌克兰未来加入欧盟的立场。【原文：The Druzhba pipeline carrying Russian oil through Ukraine to Hungary and Slovakia may have been fixed after recent damage but Ukraine may be holding up restarting supplies to pressure Hungary to drop it opposition to Ukraine's future membership in the European Union, Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico said on Sunday.】

item.title: 英国央行经济学家曼恩称，英国最低工资标准的提高正推高青年失业率
item.description: 英国央行政策制定者凯瑟琳·曼恩周日在接受报纸采访时表示，过去三年英国针对年轻劳动者的最低工资大幅上涨，导致该年龄段失业率上升。【原文：A sharp rise in Britain's minimum wage for younger workers over the past three years has contributed to an increase in unemployment for that age group, Bank of England policymaker Catherine Mann said in a newspaper interview on Sunday.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，优步进军欧洲7个新市场，加速外卖业务布局
item.description: 据《金融时报》周日报道，优步今年将把外卖业务扩展至欧洲七个新国家，科技集团正加紧在价值数十亿欧元的食品配送市场展开角逐。【原文：Uber is expanding its delivery business into seven new European countries this year as tech groups ramp up their efforts in the multibillion-euro food-delivery market, the Financial Times reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 五角大楼威胁在人工智能安全保障争议中切断与Anthropic的合作，Axios报道
item.description: 据Axios周六援引政府官员报道，五角大楼正考虑终止与人工智能公司Anthropic的合作关系，因该公司坚持对美军使用其模型设置某些限制。【原文：The Pentagon is considering ending its relationship with artificial intelligence company Anthropic over its insistence on keeping some restrictions on how the U.S. military uses its models, Axios reported on Saturday, citing an administration official.】

item.title: 欧洲央行开启欧元生命线，力图提升全球影响力
item.description: 欧洲央行正向几乎所有外国敞开欧元生命线，以在地缘政治动荡和联盟关系松动之际提升单一货币的全球作用。【原文：The European Central Bank is opening its euro lifeline to nearly all foreign countries to boost the single currency's global role amid geopolitical turmoil and fraying alliances.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将欧元后盾机制全球化以强化该货币的国际地位
item.description: 欧洲央行周六公布计划，将扩大其欧元流动性支持机制的适用范围，使其在全球范围内永久有效，旨在增强单一货币的国际地位。【原文：The European Central Bank unveiled plans on Saturday to widen access to its euro liquidity backstop, making it globally available and permanent in a bid to bolster the international role of the single currency.】

item.title: 印度贷款机构Manappuram获印度央行批准，允许贝恩资本共同控股
item.description: 印度非银行金融机构Manappuram Finance周六宣布，已获得印度储备银行最终批准，允许贝恩资本收购该公司股权及可转换证券的联合控制权，持股比例最高可达41.66%。【原文：India's Manappuram Finance has received final approval from the Reserve Bank of India for Bain Capital to acquire joint control and up to 41.66% of the company's equity and convertible instruments, the non‑bank lender said on Saturday.】

item.title: SpaceX的Starlink卫星互联网服务获越南批准
item.description: 越南政府已批准SpaceX公司在该国推出其Starlink卫星互联网服务，越南官方媒体周六报道称。【原文：Vietnam's government has allowed SpaceX to launch its Starlink satellite internet service in the country, state media reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 焦点：人工智能电影学院培养好莱坞新一代电影人
item.description: 去年因制作放缓而失业并被边缘化的好莱坞特效老将迈克尔·恩格，在浏览洛杉矶招聘信息时发现自己简历中的空白——机器学习经验。【原文：Laid-off and sidelined by last year's production slowdown, Hollywood visual‑effects veteran Michael Eng discovered a gap in his resume while perusing job listings in Los Angeles -- experience in machine learning.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋将缺席下周印度人工智能峰会，公司表示。
item.description: 英伟达公司周六表示，首席执行官黄仁勋下周将不会前往印度参加印度人工智能影响力峰会，该峰会预计将吸引全球科技行业和政治领袖出席。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang will not be travelling to India next week for a India AI Impact Summit, which global technology industry and political leaders are likely to attend, the company said on Saturday.】

item.title: 中国字节跳动公司推出豆包2.0人工智能聊天机器人
item.description: 据网联数据公司周六发布的报告显示，中国字节跳动公司已推出道宝2.0聊天机器人，这是对当前国内使用最广泛的人工智能应用程序道宝的升级版本。【原文：China’s ByteDance has rolled out its Doubao 2.0 chatbot, an upgrade of Doubao which is currently the country’s most widely used artificial intelligence app, according to QuestMobile, the company said on Saturday.】

item.title: 中国AI模型装点春节，距DeepSeek事件已过一年
item.description: 随着中国即将迎来周日开始的农历新年假期，在DeepSeek凭借颠覆性的R1和V3模型横空出世一年后，其竞争对手们正争相发布人工智能模型。【原文：As China prepares for Lunar New Year holidays starting on Sunday, rivals to DeepSeek are scrambling to release artificial-intelligence models a year after it burst onto the scene with its game-changing R1 and V3 models.】

item.title: 《The Information》报道称，安杜瑞尔公司正就新融资进行讨论，公司估值已突破600亿美元。
item.description: 据《信息》周五报道，知情人士透露，美国国防公司安杜瑞尔正就以至少600亿美元估值筹集数十亿美元新资金进行谈判。【原文：U.S. defense firm Anduril is in talks to raise billions in new funding at a valuation of at least $60 billion, The Information reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普政府发布《海事行动计划》旨在重振美国造船业
item.description: 特朗普政府周五公布了重建美国造船业及其他海事产业的计划，部分资金将来自对中国制造船舶运抵美国的货物征收港口费——这项税费已被中美双方同意暂停一年。【原文：The Trump administration on Friday released its plan to rebuild U.S. shipbuilding and other maritime businesses, paid for in part by port fees on cargo delivered to the United States on ships made in China - levies the U.S. and China agreed to pause for one year.】

item.title: "Swift Home"商标遭弃用，因泰勒·斯威夫特提出异议
item.description: 一家申请联邦"Swift Home"商标的床上用品公司，在流行歌手泰勒·斯威夫特施压后已放弃申请。该公司律师周五向路透社透露了这一消息。【原文：A bedding company that applied for a federal "Swift Home" trademark has abandoned its application following pressure from pop star Taylor Swift, an attorney for the company told Reuters on Friday.】
